attributes.additional_details:
I WOULD LIKE TO START A PETITION  TO HAVE Wi-Fi

                                  FREE IN ALL HOSPITALS

I was unfortunate to stay in over night  and to access the Wi-Fi  I
Had to purchase BT connection at £10.00 for 24 Hours  this
Rises for longer  in this 21st century  I am asking all Mps and the public to
Sign a petition to have this Free for  ALL who have to stay in hospital

 This was a comfort to me I was able to talk to my wife and family
And maintain  good well being and  calm
